answer:
QUESTION

i m 25 years old, my husband divorce me 5 years back by saying 3 times talak at 3 different place, then i started living with my parent from 5 years, i have no contact with my husband from 5 years and now even i dont know where is he, i want 2 do second marriage what i will do, i have baby of 5 years with me,he even not seen the baby since birth,i m the one to earn for her, i want to restart my life what i will do? and plz explain me how 2 perform eddath?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh
 

The ‘iddah started from the time of the first divorce.  Since five years have passed, the ‘iddah has finished, regardless of whether you were aware of your ‘iddah or not. 

Hence, you may remarry as your ‘iddah is complete. 

 

هي انتظار مدة معلومة يلزم المرأة بعد زوال النكاح حقيقة أو شبهة

(الفتاوى العالمكيرية، كتاب الطلاق، الباب الثالث عشر: 1/526؛ رشيدية)

 

( ومبدأ العدة بعد الطلاق و ) بعد ( الموت ) على الفور ( وتنقضي العدة وإن جهلت ) المرأة ( بهما ) أي بالطلاق والموت لأنها أجل فلا يشترط العلم بمضيه

(الدر المختار المطبوع برد المحتار، كتاب الطلاق، باب العدة: 3/520؛ سعيد)

 

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum

Ml. Abrar Mirza,
Student Darul Iftaa
